name: Farm Mania: Silk Road
description:
The Great Silk Road was a vast trading route that connected the East and West and gave
rise to a great number of unique towns, cities, and even states.

So, what do we know about it?

Right away, we begin to imagine the endless sands of a scorching hot desert. A seemingly never-ending trail of caravans laden with rich wares, crossing the sand dunes in the same manner ships cut through waves in the vast ocean...

Become a great Caliph and found a legendary city at a busy intersection on the Silk Road – a city whose story will pass through the ages. Turn a lifeless desert into a beautiful oasis.
Cultivate fields, harvest bountiful crops, raise livestock, build bakeries and workshops, and manufacture goods and products. Kit out caravans and trade goods with neighbors and friends.

Also explore far away lands of the desert, open new territories and send your goods to another cities in exchange of unique resources and gold.

- Turn a desert oasis into a flourishing valley
- Become a wise and great ruler!
- Develop crafts and make goods
- Trade with the whole world!
- Build a truly legendary city!
- Explore the vast land of the desert
